Source: ESC-MSCs (embryonic stem cells-derived mesenchymal stem cell)|Primary cell
Project_Title: Analysis of miRNAs expression in extracellular vesicles derived from human ESC-MSCs
Project_Description: Through the utilization of ultracentrifugation, we obtained extracellular vesicles secreted by human ESC-MSCs. Subsequently, the small RNA sequencing analysis was conducted to investigate the expression of miRNAs within these extracellular vesicles.
